text: 12.45 Hib 6.4, 2 Pi 2.20-22 Ne nɨŋɨd, okok amɨl kɨcheki tɨmel ne tek mel, kɨcheki tɨmel yɨbɨl anep kugul ak poŋɨd apɨl, mɨgan anɨb ak yenɨgabal agak. Anɨgek, bɨ anɨb ak nop mulɨk sɨkel, ned tep yolɨgup tek mel, pɨsnep mɨd tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak tek nɨm, binɨb mɨñɨl nab awl mɨdɨl tap tɨtɨmel gɨpal okok, kɨli abe pɨsnep mɨd tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabal agak.
